title: 2 test failures while building for debian with Python 3.7
body:
#### What is the problem?
We need to add 3.7 testing, at least for a single matrix run or may be (also) for appveyor to spread the loa

```
======================================================================
FAIL: datalad.support.tests.test_network.test_url_samples
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/nose/case.py", line 197, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "/build/datalad-0.10.2/.pybuild/cpython3_3.7_datalad/build/datalad/support/tests/test_network.py", line 249, in test_url_samples
    _check_ri("file:///~/path/sp1", URL, localpath='/~/path/sp1', scheme='file', path='/~/path/sp1', exact_str=False)
  File "/build/datalad-0.10.2/.pybuild/cpython3_3.7_datalad/build/datalad/support/tests/test_network.py", line 139, in _check_ri
    assert_in('Parsed version of', cml.out)
AssertionError: 'Parsed version of' not found in ''

======================================================================
FAIL: datalad.support.tests.test_network.test_get_local_file_url_linux
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/nose/case.py", line 197, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "/build/datalad-0.10.2/.pybuild/cpython3_3.7_datalad/build/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 825, in newfunc
    return func(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/build/datalad-0.10.2/.pybuild/cpython3_3.7_datalad/build/datalad/support/tests/test_network.py", line 406, in test_get_local_file_url_linux
    eq_(get_local_file_url('/a~'), 'file:///a%7E')
AssertionError: 'file:///a~' != 'file:///a%7E'
```
